Books.Title: The Art Of Being Alone
Books.Author: Renuka Gavarni
Books.About: The Art of Being Alone: Solitude Is My Home, Loneliness Was My Cage by Renuka Gavrani is a self-help book that explores the transformative journey from loneliness to solitude, emphasizing personal growth and self-discovery.

Books.Title: It Start With Us
Books.Author: Collin Hoover
Books.About: It Starts with Us is a romance novel by Colleen Hoover, published by Atria Books on October 18, 2022. It is the sequel to her 2016 best-selling novel It Ends with Us. The novel continues from where It Ends with Us ended and centers on the relationship between Lily and Atlas.

Books.Title: The Subtle of not Giving fuck
Books.Author: Mark Manson
Books.About: Individuals should seek to find meaning through what they find to be important and only engage in values that they can control. Values (such as popularity) that are not under a person's control are, according to the book, 'bad values'. Furthermore, individuals should strive to replace these uncontrollable values with things they have the capability to change, such as punctuality, honesty, or kindness. Manson further cautions against claiming certainty about knowledge that is out of one's grasp, especially in the case of attempting to leave a legacy. Meaning can be found, Manson claims, when one seeks to create joy in the moment for one's self and those around one, as opposed to being concerned with building a body of work as a legacy.

Books.Title: Your hurt is the sea
Books.Author: Nikita Gill
Books.About: Let poetry help you examine the depths of your wounds. Let it remind you that no matter how deep it goes, you will be able to heal it because you have been able to heal every single wound inflicted on your heart and soul before.

Books.Title: The picture of Dorian gray
Books.Author: Oscar Wildel
Books.About: The Picture of Dorian Gray explores the theme of moral decay and the consequences of vanity. Its main message is that the pursuit of beauty and pleasure without regard for morality leads to spiritual corruption and downfall.

Books.Title: Attitude is everything
Books.Author: Jeff Kellerl
Books.About: You have goals and you are committed to doing them, no one can stop you from being successful. Commitment is the essence of ultimate success.

Books.Title: What a way to go
Books.Author: Bella Mackie
Books.About: A vile multimillionaire, Anthony Wistern, dies in mysterious circumstances at his lavish 60th birthday party somewhere not a million miles from Chipping Norton. He is shunted to a dull afterlife and made to watch what happens next, along with the reader. It's like an even more amoral Lovely Bones.

Books.Title: The Thursday Murder Club
Books.Author: Richard Osman
Books.About: The Thursday Murder Club is a wildly entertaining series by Richard Osman following the investigations of four elderly – and mostly amateur – sleuths as they put their skills together to solve crimes and bring justice to the Cooper Chase Retirement Village and beyond.

Books.Title: CyberCrime
Books.Author: Davie Wall
Books.About: The Transformation of Crime in the Information Age explores how the rise of the internet and technology has reshaped crime, particularly cybercrime, and its impact on society. The book examines various types of cybercrime, the role of technology in facilitating these crimes, and the challenges faced by law enforcement and policymakers in addressing them. It also analyzes the broader social and economic implications of cybercrime.

Books.Title: The Art Of Leaving
Books.Author: Ayelet Tsabari
Books.About: It is a memoir that explores her life journey from the loss of her father as a young child to her search for home and identity through travel and self-discovery. The book traces her experiences in Israel, including her mandatory military service and her journey to define herself as a writer, while also delving into her travels to various places like New York, Canada, Thailand, and India. Ultimately, the memoir explores the themes of grief, identity, belonging, and the search for a sense of home, both geographically and within oneself.

Books.Title: City of friends
Books.Author: Joanna Trollope
Books.About: It tells the story of four women friends, now in their late forties, who bonded when they discovered they were the only female students studying economics at university. Today they are all successful working women, out-earning their partners and buying their own power wardrobes.

readingList.Title: City of friends
readingList.Author: Joanna Trollope
readingList.About: It tells the story of four women friends, now in their late forties, who bonded when they discovered they were the only female students studying economics at university. Today they are all successful working women, out-earning their partners and buying their own power wardrobes.
